    • Constructor Detail

      • ModDetect_NextN

        public ModDetect_NextN(java.io.File[] modifierLexicons,
                       boolean[] modifierDetectionSettings)
                throws java.lang.Exception
        Loads the modifier lexicons.
        Parameters:
        modifierLexicons - Array that contains the negation, intensifier and diminisher lexicon.
        modifierDetectionSettings - Says which modifier types are supposed to be considered.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Throws exception if the lexicons can not be read or if an invalid modifier detector method is selected.

    • Method Detail

      • annotateNextN

        public void annotateNextN(java.util.ArrayList<Tweet> corpus,
                          int n)
        Modifies the next n tokens after a modifier cue.
        Parameters:
        corpus - The to be annotated corpus.
        n - Modifies next n tokens after a modifier has occured.

        Loads the negation lexicon.
        Parameters:

        Throws:
